name: cupertino_icons
description: Default icons asset for Cupertino widgets based on Apple styled icons

name: shared_preferences
description: Flutter plugin for reading and writing simple key-value pairs. Wraps NSUserDefaults on iOS and SharedPreferences on Android.

name: firebase_core
description: Flutter plugin for Firebase Core, enabling connecting to multiple Firebase apps.

name: url_launcher
description: Flutter plugin for launching a URL. Supports web, phone, SMS, and email schemes.

name: http
description: A composable, multi-platform, Future-based API for HTTP requests.

name: image_picker
description: Flutter plugin for selecting images from the Android and iOS image library, and taking new pictures with the camera.

name: provider
description: A wrapper around InheritedWidget to make them easier to use and more reusable.

name: intl
description: Contains code to deal with internationalized/localized messages, date and number formatting and parsing, bi-directional text, and other internationalization issues.

name: path_provider
description: Flutter plugin for getting commonly used locations on host platform file systems, such as the temp and app data directories.

name: flutter_svg
description: An SVG rendering and widget library for Flutter, which allows painting and displaying Scalable Vector Graphics 1.1 files.

name: firebase_auth
description: Flutter plugin for Firebase Auth, enabling Android and iOS authentication using passwords, phone numbers and identity providers like Google, Facebook and Twitter.

name: dio
description: A powerful Http client for Dart, which supports Interceptors, FormData, Request Cancellation, File Downloading, Timeout etc.

name: firebase_messaging
description: Flutter plugin for Firebase Cloud Messaging, a cross-platform messaging solution that lets you reliably deliver messages on Android and iOS.

name: cached_network_image
description: Flutter library to load and cache network images. Can also be used with placeholder and error widgets.

name: google_fonts
description: A package to include fonts from fonts.google.com in your Flutter app.

name: cloud_firestore
description: Flutter plugin for Cloud Firestore, a cloud-hosted, noSQL database with live synchronization and offline support on Android and iOS.

name: permission_handler
description: Permission plugin for Flutter. This plugin provides a cross-platform (iOS, Android) API to request and check permissions.

name: flutter_local_notifications
description: A cross platform plugin for displaying and scheduling local notifications for Flutter applications with the ability to customise for each platform.

name: fluttertoast
description: Toast Library for Flutter, Easily create toast messages in single line of code

name: webview_flutter
description: A Flutter plugin that provides a WebView widget on Android and iOS.

name: path
description: A string-based path manipulation library. All of the path operations you know and love, with solid support for Windows, POSIX (Linux and Mac OS X), and the web.

name: get
description: Open screens/snackbars/dialogs without context, manage states and inject dependencies easily with GetX.

name: flutter_bloc
description: Flutter Widgets that make it easy to implement the BLoC (Business Logic Component) design pattern. Built to be used with the bloc state management package.

name: carousel_slider
description: A carousel slider widget, support infinite scroll and custom child widget.

name: font_awesome_flutter
description: The Font Awesome Icon pack available as Flutter Icons. Provides 1600 additional icons to use in your apps.

name: google_maps_flutter
description: A Flutter plugin for integrating Google Maps in iOS and Android applications.

name: geolocator
description: Geolocation plugin for Flutter. This plugin provides a cross-platform (iOS, Android) API for generic location (GPS etc.) functions.

name: uuid
description: RFC4122 (v1, v4, v5) UUID Generator and Parser for all Dart platforms (Web, VM, Flutter)

name: meta
description: Annotations that developers can use to express the intentions that otherwise can't be deduced by statically analyzing the source code. These annotations are intended to be used by tools to provide a better user experience.

name: google_sign_in
description: Flutter plugin for Google Sign-In, a secure authentication system for signing in with a Google account on Android and iOS.

name: equatable
description: A Dart package that helps to implement value based equality without needing to explicitly override == and hashCode.

name: collection
description: Collections and utilities functions and classes related to collections.

name: json_annotation
description: Classes and helper functions that support JSON code generation via the `json_serializable` package.

name: firebase_analytics
description: Flutter plugin for Google Analytics for Firebase, an app measurement solution that provides insight on app usage and user engagement on Android and iOS.

name: file_picker
description: A package that allows you to use a native file explorer to pick single or multiple absolute file paths, with extension filtering support.

name: sqflite
description: Flutter plugin for SQLite, a self-contained, high-reliability, embedded, SQL database engine.

name: flutter_lints
description: Recommended lints for Flutter apps, packages, and plugins to encourage good coding practices.

name: firebase_storage
description: Flutter plugin for Firebase Cloud Storage, a powerful, simple, and cost-effective object storage service for Android and iOS.

name: rxdart
description: RxDart is an implementation of the popular reactiveX api for asynchronous programming, leveraging the native Dart Streams api.

name: video_player
description: Flutter plugin for displaying inline video with other Flutter widgets on Android, iOS, and web.

name: crypto
description: Implementations of SHA, MD5, and HMAC cryptographic functions

name: get_it
description: Simple direct Service Locator that allows to decouple the interface from a concrete implementation and  to access the concrete implementation from everywhere in your App"

name: package_info_plus

name: firebase_crashlytics
description: Flutter plugin for Firebase Crashlytics. It reports uncaught errors to the Firebase console.

name: flutter_html
description: A Flutter widget rendering static HTML and CSS as Flutter widgets.

name: http_parser
description: A platform-independent package for parsing and serializing HTTP formats.

name: lottie
description: Render After Effects animations natively on Flutter. This package is a pure Dart implementation of a Lottie player.

name: async
description: Utility functions and classes related to the 'dart:async' library.

name: connectivity_plus
description: Flutter plugin for discovering the state of the network (WiFi & mobile/cellular) connectivity on Android and iOS.

name: flutter_secure_storage
description: Flutter Secure Storage provides API to store data in secure storage. Keychain is used in iOS, KeyStore based solution is used in Android.

name: platform

name: flutter_spinkit
description: A collection of loading indicators animated with flutter. Heavily inspired by @tobiasahlin's SpinKit.

name: flutter_launcher_icons

name: share_plus

name: shimmer
description: A package provides an easy way to add shimmer effect in Flutter project

name: file
description: A pluggable, mockable file system abstraction for Dart. Supports local file system access, as well as in-memory file systems, record-replay file systems, and chroot file systems.

name: photo_view
description: Photo View provides a gesture sensitive zoomable widget. Photo View is largely used to show interactive images and other stuff such as SVG.

name: location
description: A Flutter plugin to easily handle realtime location in iOS and Android. Provides settings for optimizing performance or battery.

name: device_info_plus
description: Flutter plugin providing detailed information about the device (make, model, etc.), and Android or iOS version the app is running on.

name: plugin_platform_interface
description: Reusable base class for platform interfaces of Flutter federated plugins, to help enforce best practices.

name: auto_size_text
description: Flutter widget that automatically resizes text to fit perfectly within its bounds.

name: process
description: A pluggable, mockable process invocation abstraction for Dart.

name: typed_data
description: Utility functions and classes related to the dart:typed_data library.

name: flutter_staggered_grid_view
description: Provides a collection of Flutter grids layouts (staggered, masonry, quilted, woven, etc.).

name: camera

name: hive
description: Lightweight and blazing fast key-value database written in pure Dart. Strongly encrypted using AES-256.

name: args
description: Library for defining parsers for parsing raw command-line arguments into a set of options and values using GNU and POSIX style options.

name: flutter_screenutil
description: A flutter plugin for adapting screen and font size.Guaranteed to look good on different models

name: source_span
description: A library for identifying source spans and locations.

name: percent_indicator

name: string_scanner
description: A class for parsing strings using a sequence of patterns.

name: flutter_slidable

name: charcode
description: Constants for ASCII and common non-ASCII character codes. Integer constants corresponding to the code points of individual characters.

name: html
description: APIs for parsing and manipulating HTML content outside the browser.

name: archive

name: term_glyph
description: Useful Unicode glyphs and ASCII substitutes.

name: mime

name: image

name: xml
description: A lightweight library for parsing, traversing, querying, transforming and building XML documents.

name: js
description: Annotations to create static Dart interfaces for JavaScript APIs.

name: clock
description: A fakeable wrapper for dart:core clock APIs

name: logging

name: geocoding

name: logger

name: image_cropper

name: yaml

name: badges

name: fl_chart

name: convert

name: ffi

name: hive_flutter
description: Extension for Hive. Makes it easier to use Hive in Flutter apps.

name: bloc
description: A predictable state management library that helps implement the BLoC (Business Logic Component) design pattern.

name: firebase_dynamic_links
description: Flutter plugin for Google Dynamic Links for Firebase, an app solution for creating and handling links across multiple platforms.

name: flutter_inappwebview
